body:
SELECT
  a / data[at0001] / events[at0002] / data[at0003] / items[at0004] / value as T0_dv_text,
  a / data[at0001] / events[at0002] / data[at0003] / items[at0005] / value as T0_dv_coded_text,
  a / data[at0001] / events[at0002] / data[at0003] / items[at0008] / value as T0_dv_quantity,
  a / data[at0001] / events[at0002] / data[at0003] / items[at0009] / value as T0_dv_proportion,
  a / data[at0001] / events[at0002] / data[at0003] / items[at0011] / value as T0_dv_count,
  a / data[at0001] / events[at0002] / data[at0003] / items[at0012] / value as T0_dv_date_time,
  a / data[at0001] / events[at0002] / data[at0003] / items[at0013] / value as T0_dv_time,
  a / data[at0001] / events[at0002] / data[at0003] / items[at0014] / value as T0_dv_date,
  a / data[at0001] / events[at0002] / data[at0003] / items[at0015] / value as T0_dv_ordinal,
  a / data[at0001] / events[at0002] / data[at0003] / items[at0019] / value as T0_dv_boolean,
  a / data[at0001] / events[at0002] / data[at0003] / items[at0020] / value as T0_dv_identifier,
  a / data[at0001] / events[at0002] / data[at0003] / items[at0021] / value as T0_dv_duration
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.supported_data_types.v0]
  )
LIMIT
  1
ORDER BY
  c / context / start_time / value DESC
